akn:section.akn:heading: International agreements excluded from provisions of chapter

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 1511. International agreements excluded from provisions of chapter This chapter does not apply to treaties, conventions, protocols, and other international agreements, or proclamations thereof by the President. (Pub. L. 90–620, Oct. 22, 1968, 82 Stat. 1278.)
Historical and Revision NotesBased on 44 U.S. Code, 1964 ed., § 312 (July 26, 1935, ch. 417, § 12, 49 Stat. 503).
